name: Risk Level
query:
SELECT
    cm.risk_level,
    COUNT(fr.name) AS total
FROM `tabCompliance Master` cm
LEFT JOIN `tabFactory Regulatory Register` fr
    ON fr.compliance = cm.name
    AND fr.category = 'Compliance'
    AND fr.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY
    cm.risk_level
ORDER BY
    FIELD(cm.risk_level, 'Low', 'Medium', 'High');
